Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
I found with scaletest stuff... if you have a lot of deamons and marketmakers... its best to set a firewall like so:
```sudo ufw default deny incoming
sudo ufw default deny outgoing
sudo ufw enable
start everything
sudo ufw disable```

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: this lets everything bind to the ports it wants before opening outgoing/incoming connections which can and do use up the ports that the deamons want.

Author: ComputerGenie#2331
Content: *provided you use ufw

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: yes... I guess you can do it with other tools, but that was the fastest and easiest way to do it

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: replicated bug on mac for manage coins drop down disappearing when clicked on "fetch coindb update" button.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: For a work around, if it happens, just pressing CMD/CTRL+R (View/Reload Menu) and going back to manage coins screen shows the updated drop down menu.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: So, it's the issue from in between the update process.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: Will take a look a it some time soon, but would really appreciate if someone can help with this issue.
